transArray.content: The area is small, but very clean, and the breakfast is very lively

Thank you very much for your stay and sharing. Thank you very much for your recognition of the breakfast in the hotel. Only by living well and eating well can you feel at home. Breakfast is served from 7 a.m. to 10 a.m., and we now offer purified white porridge, freshly baked egg tarts, croissants and other delicious foods. Since the hotel has been open for a long time, there may be some deficiencies in various aspects. We have gradually updated the rooms The on-site facilities are provided for customers' use. We also hope that we can do better under your supervision. At the same time, if you have any dissatisfaction during your stay, you can contact the front desk at any time. We will solve it for you in time. I hope you can see our efforts and Make progress and look forward to your visit again. Manager: Ji Hongjiao
